description: This easy 6 ingredient one bowl raw cookie dough recipe is egg and dairy-free and so delicious.
keywords: edible vegan cookie dough, raw vegan cookie dough, vegan chocolate chip cookie dough
name: Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups flour (Heat treat before adding to the butter mixture. See note below.)
8 tablespoons vegan butter (Butter should be room temperature)
1 1/2 cups vegan chocolate chips (Enjoy Life is our preferred brand)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, beat the 8 tablespoons of vegan butter, 1 cup of sugar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon of pure vanilla extract until the butter is smooth and creamy.
Add the 1 1/2 cups of heat treated flour (see note below) and 1 1/2 cups of vegan chocolate chips and beat until fully combined. Add water by the tablespoon until you get the consistency you desire.
Eat with a spoon or roll into bite sized balls.
